description: The Knowledge Information and Technology Services (KITS) Branch at National Research Council Canada requires the services of experienced professionals on an as and when needed basis in response to demand to deliver IM/IT related projects.
full_summary:
================================()


**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

### TBIPS - Project Delivery Services with Multiple Resource Categories

**Reference Number:** cb-255-84135126
**Solicitation Number:** 23-58243
**Publication Date:** February 12, 2024

**Overview**

The National Research Council of Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Project Delivery Services with multiple resource categories under the Transformational Benevolent Innovations and Process Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement.

**Scope of Work**

The Knowledge Information and Technology Services (KITS) Branch at National Research Council Canada requires the services of the following categories of resources:

* Business Analyst (Level 3)
* Platform Analyst
* Technical Architect
* Enterprise Architect

These resources will be engaged "as and when needed" to deliver IM/IT-related projects.

**Key Information**

* **Tender Closing Date:** February 29, 2024, at 14:00 (ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026
* **Publications**: The RFP document and other information can be downloaded from the following link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31753/23-58243_npp_project-delivery-services_final.pdf>

**Contact Information**

For clarification and additional information, please contact:

Philippe G. Cléroux, P.Eng.
Phone: (613) 998-1073
Email: philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca

**Government Trade Agreements**

This tender applies to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on a technical merit and price combined scoring system. The selection criteria comprise of:

* Technical Merit
* Price

The Contractor with the highest combined score
